text: Mr. Morgan's Last Love is an 2013 comedy-drama movie based on Francoise Dorner's French novel La Douceur Assassine. It is written and directed by Sandra Nettelbeck. It stars Michael Caine and Clémence Poésy. It was released to negative reviews on November 1, 2013. title: Mr. Morgan's Last Love
